title: What is the problem with plastic? - BBC Newsround
body: Plastic is useful and everywhere, but it can also harm the environment and animals. Learn how plastic is made, used, recycled and disposed of, and why it causes plastic pollution in the oceans and on land.
readable_content: - User (2023-12-08): I found a text about the problem with plastic. It explains the issues caused by plastic waste and how it harms the environment and animals. It also mentions efforts to tackle plastic pollution and reduce the use of plastic.
summary:
The text seems to highlight the negative impact of plastic waste on the environment and animals, while also mentioning efforts to address plastic pollution. It conveys a concern for the issue and a willingness to take action. 
Sentiment: 0.8
